channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
@jeffjarvis @DaveHiott you know what i want -- EZ-pass for news.

if i can drive the same car in Ohio or New Jersey and fly through the toll booths, why can't i do the same on the web.
item.source:markdown:
@jeffjarvis @DaveHiott you know what i want -- EZ-pass for news.
if i can drive the same car in Ohio or New Jersey and fly through the toll booths, why can't i do the same on the web.

item.description:
@DaveHiott A really compelling story But what sense does it make for me, someone who lives in New York, to subscribe to the Dallas News?

cc @jeffjarvis
item.source:markdown:
@DaveHiott A really compelling story But what sense does it make for me, someone who lives in New York, to subscribe to the Dallas News?
cc @jeffjarvis

item.description: @DaveHiott Since you're a reporter -- I thought you should know this is an ad. The first thing I see is an ad saying I need to subscribe.
item.source:markdown: @DaveHiott Since you're a reporter -- I thought you should know this is an ad. The first thing I see is an ad saying I need to subscribe.

item.description: @raymondcamden Thanks. I'm good at MySQL. Does this database run MySQL queries, or do I have to learn a new approach?
item.source:markdown: @raymondcamden Thanks. I'm good at MySQL. Does this database run MySQL queries, or do I have to learn a new approach?

item.description: I'm thinking about using Indexed Database API. Is this a crazy thought? https://t.co/ihCCFXRYie
item.source:markdown: I'm thinking about using Indexed Database API. Is this a crazy thought? https://t.co/ihCCFXRYie

item.description:
@marshallk you're a good boychik. ;-)

my parents are both gone, I wish I could send them a hey there message that they'd actually get. ;-)
item.source:markdown:
@marshallk you're a good boychik. ;-)
my parents are both gone, I wish I could send them a hey there message that they'd actually get. ;-)

item.description:
@beet_keeper we considered that possibility, I did a curl request from the command line on the server, and it returned English text.

the server is in NY, at Digital Ocean.
item.source:markdown:
@beet_keeper we considered that possibility, I did a curl request from the command line on the server, and it returned English text.
the server is in NY, at Digital Ocean.

item.description: A problem reading Etsy feeds, it's unclear why they translate feeds to German when my app reads them? We've never seen this behavior before. https://t.co/0eeqEQd1VA
item.source:markdown: A problem reading Etsy feeds, it's unclear why they translate feeds to German when my app reads them? We've never seen this behavior before. https://t.co/0eeqEQd1VA

item.description:
@alexwilliams It was a validator not reader. https://t.co/lWjn0wpHqB

@alexwilliams And in the rest of the tweet I explain what it is.
item.source:markdown:
@alexwilliams It was a validator not reader. https://t.co/lWjn0wpHqB
@alexwilliams And in the rest of the tweet I explain what it is.

item.description: @garthk I'm developing a feed reader myself -- and testing it with some great people. A natural outgrowth of testing a new reader is finding problems with feeds and trying to work with them, or not.
item.source:markdown: @garthk I'm developing a feed reader myself -- and testing it with some great people. A natural outgrowth of testing a new reader is finding problems with feeds and trying to work with them, or not.
